name: Atari
summary:
Plug It In & Play TV Games: Atari was released in 2004 by Jakks Pacific in both one and two player versions. The paddle controller contains 13 classic Atari games:

Super Breakout
Casino
Warlords
Arcade Warlords
Circus Atari
Street Racer
Demons To Diamonds
Steeple Chase
Night Driver
Breakout
Canyon Bomber
Video Olympics
Pong
